directions: Steep the tea bag in boiling water for about 2 minutes. Remove and discard bags. In a medium bowl, stir together the tea, sugar, orange juice concentrate and water until sugar is dissolved. Stir in whiskey. Cover and place in the freezer for at least 4 hours.
Scoop out spoonfuls into a glass and top with a little bit of grapefruit soda.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
1 (12 fluid ounce) can grapefruit flavored soda
title: Grandma's Whiskey Slush
